main event: A UFO sighting occurred on 11 October 1957 in Levittown, New York, recorded in Project Blue Book.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 2-3 minutes and involved one object,The object was described as round, fuzzy, and larger than the evening star,It was concluded to likely be a balloon, despite initial assumptions of it being a UFO,The trails of the object were reported to be 3-4 times the size of the object itself,Additional reports from various locations in the Western U.S. mentioned similar sightings of fireballs.
witness description: The observer described the object as round and fuzzy, larger than the evening star.
